projects.title: Site Geek Singers
projects.description: One-page Wordpress for my geek choir.

projects.title: Personal book shelf app
projects.description: I read a lot and wanted to make statistics on my readings :3. Books infos are gathered using openlibrary's public APIs.

projects.title: DAPY P4: Chess tournament manager
projects.description: Console app for chess tournaments. Add, display and modify players and tournaments in database. Assists user in matching players and keeping track of results.

projects.title: DAPY P6: Just Stream it
projects.description: Front-end Javascript project. Read data from a public API listing movies and displays chosen categories in an interactive "Netflix-like" carousels.

projects.title: DAPY P9: LITReview
projects.description: Django blog app for books and articles reviews. User can log in, browse their feed, follow other users and ask for/write reviews, write reviews.

projects.title: DAPY P12: EPIC events
projects.description: Secure RESTful API for EPIC events' CRM. Provides 4 endpoints with different permissions depending on team of user (admin/sales/support).

projects.title: Character generator for our RPG campaign
projects.description: Thursday night is roleplay night! And as Old-School Essentials, the system we're playing in, is EXTREMELY LETHAL, it's nice to have a character generator available to everyone (but especially to our GM, poor creature).

projects.title: Keywords analyzer
projects.description: Dreams keywords analyzer and vizualisation with Plotly Dash.
